name: SussyCat
description:
Note: The web version kind of is glitchy and compresses the images -- there is a Windows executable that you can download (You can use https://www.winehq.org/ to run on Linux :3)
I didn't have time to finish exactly what I envisioned due to social and family obligations, so here is what I have as a late submission for https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-80-cats. I would've made music and try to make it work over websockets to have multiplayer online: maybe another day :3
